data.text:
@thebhutanese And the whole Message of Prophet Kacou Philippe is the: "Thus saith the Angel and the Lamb of April 24, 1993" who is the Lord God Himself. This is the evidence of redemption for our time and we rest on that.
https://t.co/6vNsZ0b3M9

It is always with so much pain and devastation that we share updates of such nature. Yet, amid the raging pandemic that we are fighting together, we are duty-bound to inform the general public on the unpalatable fact.
𝐌𝐨𝐇
The deceased tested positive for COVID-19 on 18th February 2022 and was due to complete his isolation. Unfortunately, he suffered from a cardiac arrest on the evening of 4th March 2022 .

An unvaccinated 83 year-old-man with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) and a probable stroke patient who has been bed ridden for more than one year has expired at the Isolation Facility at the Royal Institute of Governance and Strategic Studies.
